content:
As an AI language model, I don’t have personal opinions, but I can provide information on the topic. 
Both the visual design and content of the website are important for a website's success. A visually appealing design can attract users and establish credibility, but it's the quality and relevancy of the content that holds the user's attention and makes them stay on the website.

A good visual design can make the content more visually accessible and elegant, but if the content is poor, users are likely to leave the website quickly. Conversely, great content might keep users engaged, but they might not return to the website if the design doesn't make a good first impression or is difficult to navigate.

Therefore, it's crucial to strike a balance between the visual design and content. The website design should complement and enhance the content, create a positive impression and ultimately enable users to engage effectively and efficiently with the website.
